name: Avoid Script Functions with a very low comment/code ratio (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all Script Functions with a very low comment/code ratio.
output:
This report lists all Script Functions with a very low comment/code ratio.

This QR provides the following information:
- Script Function full name
- Comment/code ratio
rationale: A very low comment/code ratio makes the source code difficult to read, maintain and test. It is highly recommended to keep this ratio as high as possible.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of Script Functions with a very low comment/code ratio.
